# lovely-docs

This file will become your README and also the index of your
documentation.

## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install lovely_docs in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure lovely_docs package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to lovely_docs
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/xl0/lovely-docs):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/xl0/lovely-docs.git
```

or from [conda](https://anaconda.org/xl0/lovely-docs)

``` sh
$ conda install -c xl0 lovely_docs
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/lovely-docs/)

``` sh
$ pip install lovely_docs
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/xl0/lovely-docs)’s
[pages](https://xl0.github.io/lovely-docs/). Additionally you can find
package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/xl0/lovely-docs) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/lovely-docs/) respectively.
